snippet.title: Fault - Tutorial (New 3rd Person MOBA Game)
snippet.description:
We have created a tutorial to help new players learn how to play Fault!

This tutorial is the first step towards new player onboarding, it will be added in-game to help everyone learn the basics of Fault and we will continue to work on new features to improve the experience for new players. We are open to all feedback on our tutorial, if you have any suggestions on how it could be improved please let us know in the pinned comment below! 

Intro: (0:00)
Draft: (0:34)
Aspects and Favor: (0:58)
Item store and HUD: (2:00)
Laning and Map Awareness: (3:17)
Jungle and Objectives: (5:45)
Menus: (6:34)
Outro: (7:34)


Fault is a next-gen, 3rd person, multiplayer online battle arena game built in Unreal Engine 4.

Check out our website and Steam page below and team up with some friends on the battlefield!

Early Access is available now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1106750/Fault/

Paragon assets and characters in Fault are the property of Epic Games, Inc. and used under a license

Website: https://playfault.com  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/strange__matter  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/strange__matter 
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/strangematterstudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/strangematterstudios
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/playfault
